name: OREO-BOT
description: WhatsApp Bot Base using Baileys. Written in javascript

PRIVATE.description: Set it true if you want to make the bot private, leave Blank for public

PREFIX.description: put any one symbol here except @ and + , leave it Blank if you want to use multiple prefix

OWNER_NAME.description: owner name of the bot or Your Name

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Your number or bot owner number

MAKER.description: Maker Text that replace MADE WITH ❤️ BY OREO-BOT

SOCIAL_MEDIA_LINK.description: Any one Link of Your Social Media
